description: Travel tips and information to help you get started in the Capital.

texts: Everything you need to know to get started exploring your new neighbourhood. We operate the Tube, Buses, DLR, London Overground, Trams, River Services and more. Find out where you can get to, how to plan your journey, when off-peak is, and how to pay for your travel.

cards.title: How to pay
texts: Choosing how to pay for your travel can be complicated. Let us help

cards.title: Ways to get around
texts: Our visitor information page lists all our transport services. Find out more

cards.title: Get started travelling in London
texts: Tips for all new Londoners, including discounts, walking and cycling. Find out more

cards.title: Oyster and contactless account
texts: Top up, view your journeys and get refunds with an online account

cards.title: Fares
texts: Check the cost of your journey before you travel

cards.title: Maps
texts: View and download our whole range of maps

cards.title: Get the app
texts: Download and set up the free official TfL Oyster app
